text:
🌞 <1,000 new #Covid19 cases in #Scotland in today’s report, no local authority above 250/100K/7d, Scotland average 144/100K/7d; a record number of daily first #vaccine doses at 27,500 to make 543,370 to date & mass vacc centres to open on Monday

Plenty reasons to be cheerful😎 https://t.co/5Qp99BPPoa
